subject: Basketball
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Mutombo, a four-time N.B.A. defensive player of the year, and Calipari, a two-time college coach of the year, joined Tim Hardaway, Lisa Leslie and others on the 2015 ballot.
snippet: Mutombo, a four-time N.B.A. defensive player of the year, and Calipari, a two-time college coach of the year, joined Tim Hardaway, Lisa Leslie and others on the 2015 ballot.
